name: Eye of the Gods
description: The Eye of the Gods is a small celestial creature that serves as a divine conduit for its creator deity, possessing a range of notable abilities.
memorable: Offers truesight to allies and acts as a tactical conduit for its deity.
goals: To assist its allies in combat and connect with its creator deity.
relations: Serves its creator deity and can be summoned back to its side.
environment: Typically found in settings associated with celestial beings or divine missions.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage, and exceptional Wisdom for high perception.
attacks: Can perform a Slam attack dealing radiant or necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Divine Inspiration enhances allies' saving throws against fear.
senses: Possesses truesight that extends 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Has a +9 bonus in perception, making it highly adept at noticing threats.
additional_information: Ethereal Jaunt allows it to shift between planes as a bonus action.
Blazing Nimbus deals damage to hostile creatures that come too close.
Corona of Truth grants allies truesight within a specified range.
Divine Conduit creates a bond with its deity for tactical advantages.
Immune to conditions such as charmed and exhausted.
test_queries: small divine being with flying speed
ally that inspires against fear attacks
creature with divine connection to a deity
flying creature immune to poison damage
